betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§oYou probably have some old machines lying around, right?§r

You definitely know by now that Arc Furnaces can recycle machines, but starting at §5EV§r they upgrade to §a9 slots§r!

§eNote§r: This quest accepts either an §5EV§r or §9IV§r Arc Furnace. You don't have to make both.
betterquesting:10.name:8: Getting Rid of Those Old Machines
